verbs.description: A [ARGM-EXT: little] - [V: known] [ARG1: Office] of Management and Budget official is President Donald Trump ’s leading candidate to become permanent director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau , according to four people with knowledge of the matter .

[ARG1: A little - known Office of Management and Budget official] [V: is] [ARG2: President Donald Trump ’s leading candidate to become permanent director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau] , [ARGM-ADV: according to four people with knowledge of the matter] .

A little - known Office of Management and Budget official is President Donald Trump ’s [V: leading] [ARG0: candidate] to become permanent director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau , according to four people with knowledge of the matter .

A little - known Office of Management and Budget official is [ARG1: President Donald Trump] ’s leading candidate to [V: become] [ARG2: permanent director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau] , according to four people with knowledge of the matter .

A little - known Office of Management and Budget official is President Donald Trump ’s leading candidate to become permanent director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau , [V: according] to four people with knowledge of the matter .
